name: Spoopernatural Bros
description:
Spoopernatural Bros!

Play as one of two Ghost Hunters and navigate levels to escape.. 

This is the first game I've made by myself!!!  Made during Indie Game Academy bootcamp Level 2. I sought out to learn C# properly, learn everything that it takes to make something small like this. I kind of feel like a fire has been lit within me so if you play this I hope you enjoy it! c: 

Thank you to Indie Game Academy. If you are interested in learning about game dev, it has been a great place to learn. 

this was inspired by Watcher and Ghost Files hosts: Shane & Ryan. 

music credits:

  • Start Screen - Spooky Loop by 8bit Betty
  • Level 0 - I have a bad feeling about this - Alex McCulloch
  • Level 1 - Punky Troll - Pix
  • Level 2 - Melancholic Walk - Pix
  • Level 3 - Talking Cute - Alex McCulloch
